work.title: Software Engineer II
work.description:
Optimized Analytics Dashboard: Streamlined event creation and enhanced user interaction, improving efficiency by 30%.
Scalable Backend Development: Designed and optimized backend APIs to handle millions of data points in real time, ensuring secure and seamless frontend integration.
Advanced Search Optimization: Reduced search latency by 40% through effective use of Redis caching and ElasticSearch indexing.
Efficient Data Management: Engineered file upload processes and integrated CDNs for optimal data storage and rapid access.
Technologies Utilized: React, Java, Spring Boot, Redis, NoSQL, Docker, JavaScript, ElasticSearch, and Kafka.
work.technologies: React, Java, Spring Boot, Docker, JavaScript, TypeScript, AWS, ElasticSearch, MongoDB

work.title: Software Engineer Internship
work.description:
Developed a full stack video archive application that served as a platform to upload, search and play videos for Zoom Events. 
 Created a tag based video searching and sorting system utilizing the ElasticSearch and store the videos using AWS and MongoDB.
work.technologies: React, Java, Spring Boot, Docker, JavaScript, TypeScript, AWS, ElasticSearch, MongoDB

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Created a full-stack cell-view application in collaboration with JHU immunologists to analyze cell samples, draw annotations and cancer detection and successfully secured funding for at least 5 years
work.technologies: Java, Docker, Kubernetes, Python, OpenLayers, VueJS, JavaScript, TypeScript

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Created an application that streamlined the process of tracking various communication applications and their dependencies, enabling the user to be notified when any of the dependent application was being updated or had planned update which aided in avoiding unexpected application failures and compatibility issues
